text:
Kim Kardashian the style of wedding guests: sparkling and somewhat vintage

Saturday, Kanye West participated in the film Keeping Up With the Kardashians marriage of rappers Pusha T the president of Kanye & # 39; s GOOD music label and his longtime partner Virginia Williams in Virginia Beach, Virginia.

Kim posted her videos on Instagram and Kanye is getting ready. In a mirrored selfie, she wears a long-sleeved and sparkling gold Balmain mini dress and wears a Judith Leiber clutch in the shape of a brick cell phone from the 80s.

"I found the vintage Balmain looking for Pusha's wedding in Virginia, with the old phone bag," he says.

title: Kim Kardashian Glitters in Gold as She Joins Kanye West at Pusha T’s Wedding
